## Algorithm

  s_{1} = x_{0} \otimes x_{1} \\
  s_{2} = x_{0} \otimes x_{1} \otimes x_{2} ,\\
  . . . , \\
  s_{n-1} = x_{0} \otimes x_{1} \otimes x_{2}\]
